Manager

Class BookingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manager.BookingManager

  • public class BookingManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the BookingManager of MoblimaApp that handles the process of booking tickets.
    Since:
    2017-11-16

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookingManager()
      It will instantiate and get the instance of each of the various Managers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double generatePrice(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String hallClass, java.lang.String movieType, java.lang.String day)
      This method generates the ticket price that is based on the type of movie, class of cinema, age of customer, day of the week or public holiday.
      java.lang.String generateTransaction(java.lang.String email, Showtime showtime, java.lang.Double price)
      This method is to generate the booking history which depends on the hall code and the current date from the instance of Calendar class.
      static BookingManager getInstance()
      To create one instance of the BookingManager if it does not exists else it will return the instance of BookingManager that already exists.
      boolean save()
      This method calls the save method in userManager to save all the updates made.
      boolean validateSeatChoice(Showtime showtime, java.lang.String hallCode, int userRow, int userColumn)
      This method will check if the user's inputed seat choice is valid.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookingManager

        public BookingManager()
        It will instantiate and get the instance of each of the various Managers. The dateFormat is initialized to year followed by month, date, hour in 24-hour format, and minute. (E.g. 201711162259 signifies 2017, November 16, 22:59).

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static BookingManager getInstance()
        To create one instance of the BookingManager if it does not exists else it will return the instance of BookingManager that already exists.
        Returns:
        instance The instance of BookingManager that is already created.

      • validateSeatChoice

        public boolean validateSeatChoice(Showtime showtime,
                                  java.lang.String hallCode,
                                  int userRow,
                                  int userColumn)
        This method will check if the user's inputed seat choice is valid. (i.e. the choice is within the range of the layout and is not occupied).
        Parameters:
        showtime - The selected showtime object.
        hallCode - The code of the selected hall that screens the movie.
        userRow - The selected row number.
        userColumn - The selected column number.
        Returns:
        true if it is valid, else false.

      • generatePrice

        public double generatePrice(java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String hallClass,
                            java.lang.String movieType,
                            java.lang.String day)
        This method generates the ticket price that is based on the type of movie, class of cinema, age of customer, day of the week or public holiday.
        Parameters:
        email - The current customer's email.
        title - The selected title.
        hallClass - The hallClass that is tied to the showtime object selected.
        movieType - The selected type of movie.
        day - The selected movie showday.
        Returns:
        price Price of the ticket.

      • generateTransaction

        public java.lang.String generateTransaction(java.lang.String email,
                                            Showtime showtime,
                                            java.lang.Double price)
        This method is to generate the booking history which depends on the hall code and the current date from the instance of Calendar class. Transaction ID needed is also generated in the form of hallCode concatenated with the current date. (E.g. AHS201711162259).
        Parameters:
        email - The current customer's email.
        showtime - The selected movie showtime object.
        price - Price of the ticket.
        Returns:
        newBookingHistory Booking History which includes the transaction ID

      • save

        public boolean save()
        This method calls the save method in userManager to save all the updates made.
        Returns:
        true if saving is successful, else false.
